business.headline: Stocks to watch on March 20: Wipro, CEAT, Hyundai, Adani EnterprisesIn today's trading session, shares of Adani Enterprises, Wipro, Raymond, DMart, Trent, Hyundai Motor, NHPC, and others will be in focus due to key developments.

US Fed keeps interest rates unchanged: Key takeaways from the meetingThe Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) voted to keep interest rates unchanged, maintaining its benchmark rate in the range of 4.25-4.50%.
Ripple CEO claims US SEC to drop appeal against crypto firmRipple CEO, the company behind XRP, announced on X that the US Securities and Exchange Commission will drop its appeal against Ripple Labs.
Wall Street drifts higher ahead of Fed announcementUS stocks showed marginal gains on Wednesday morning as Wall Street waits for the Federal Reserve's announcement.

US markets rise ahead of key Fed interest rate decisionAt the opening bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 84.73 points to 41,666.04. The S&P 500 gained 18.29 points, reaching 5,632.95, while the Nasdaq Composite climbed 84.20 points to 17,588.32.
Government to continue footing the bill for UPI payments under Rs 2,000The scheme covers transactions up to Rs 2,000 and will be in place for one year, from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025.
India's first Trump-branded office project to be built in Pune. Check detailsOver the past decade, India has emerged as the largest international market for Trump-branded real estate.

Sensex, Nifty extend positive streak, but IT and FMCG stocks limit market gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 147.79 points to settle at 75,449.05, while the NSE Nifty50 added 73.30 points to close at 22,907.60.

REC shares rise after board clears 4th interim dividend for FY25. Check detailsREC Dividend: The company announced a dividend payout of Rs 3.6 per share, taking the total dividend declared so far in FY25 to Rs 15.4 per share.

Zomato shares surge over 4% as rally continues for 2nd day. What next?At 12:50 pm, shares of Zomato were up 4.12% to Rs 227.35 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It may be noted that Zomato shares are rising despite the possibility that it could face an old insolvency plea.

PhysicsWallah IPO: Edtech firm files for Rs 4,600 crore public listingPhysicsWallah IPO: The edtech company has taken the confidential pre-filing route, a method that allows companies to submit their IPO documents to the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) without making financial details public immediately.

SAIL shares jump 4% today as steel stocks gain. Should you buy?SAIL shares gained 4% during the intraday trading session, following a broad-based rally in steel stock prices. Read to find out if the company's stock is likely to gain further.

Missed Rs 5,000 SIP in top Nifty stocks 5 years ago? Returns may surprise youDespite the recent correction, a systematic investment plan (SIP) in top Nifty50 stocks over the past five years would have still delivered strong returns.

TCS, Infosys, HCLTech: Why major IT stocks are falling todayShares of TCS and Infosys dropped 2%, while other IT names like HCLTech, Tech Mahindra, LTIMindtree, and Coforge also traded in the red. The Nifty IT index, which had been gaining for the last three sessions, was the worst-performing sectoral index in morning trade.

Mishra Dhatu Nigam shares jump 7%. Why is defence PSU stock rising today?Mishra Dhatu Nigam stock price: At 10:36 am, Mishra Dhatu Nigam shares traded 6.27% higher at Rs 279 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

Hero MotoCorp sees mass exits, key senior executives step down: ReportNearly half a dozen top executives are believed to have stepped down in the past few days, with more exits likely in the coming weeks.

Vodafone Idea shares jump 4% after 5G launch in Mumbai. Check key detailsVodafone Idea share price today: Shares of the telecom company gained sharply during early trade after it announced the launch of 5G services in Mumbai.
Gold rates hit record high: Is this a good time to buy or book profit?On the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX), gold for April 4 contracts climbed 0.20% to an all-time high of Rs 88,890 per 10 grams.

SAIL, Tata Steel, JSW Steel, NMDC Steel: Why are steel stocks rising today?Steel stocks in focus: The rally came after the Directorate General of Trade Remedies (DGTR) suggested a 12% safeguard duty on specific steel imports for 200 days to protect local manufacturers from cheaper foreign steel.

Sensex, Nifty flat ahead of US Fed  policy outcome; Tata Steel, BPCL up 2%Stock market opening bell: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 32.28 points to 75,333.54 at 9:22 am, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 28.45 points to trade at 22,862.75.

Stock market opening today: Will Sensex, Nifty continue positive rally?Stock market opening on March 19: The benchmark indices are likely to open on a positive note, continuing their positive momentum.

Stocks to watch on March 19: Bajaj Auto, BPCL, Paytm, LIC, Zydus Life, GR InfraStocks to watch today: Bajaj Auto, BPCL, Paytm, Life Insurance Corporation of India are some of the top stocks that are likely to be in focus during today's trading session.

US stock market: Wall Street dips amid Fed uncertainty and Trump-Putin talksAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 fell 54.92 points, or 0.97%, to 5,620.20, Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 206.06 points, or 0.49%, to 41,635.57, and the Nasdaq Composite decreased 295.45 points, or 1.66%, to 17,513.21.

RBI assures IndusInd Bank customers: 'Bank's financial health remains stable'The RBI has advised depositors and investors not to react to unverified reports regarding IndusInd Bank and instead trust official statements and regulatory updates.

Bengaluru man says Rs 1.5 lakh/month not enough: 'Everything is super inflated'In a recent social media post, a Bengaluru resident mentioned that despite earning a good income, he and his fiancée still live in PG accommodation, unable to afford a decent rental space in the city's expensive housing market.

Sensex settles 1,100 points higher, Nifty above 22,800; Zomato surges 7%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex settled 1131.31 points higher at 75,301.26, while the NSE Nifty50 closed over 325.55 points higher to 22,834.30.

Zomato stock price zooms 6% today despite reports of insolvency pleaZomato stock price: Despite the insolvency plea, Zomato shares have not been impacted. They were trading 6.03% higher at Rs 216.15 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It had earlier reached an intraday high of Rs 216.50.

Online PF transfer claim rejected? How to apply againEPF claims can be turned down for multiple reasons. Hence, to avoid rejections, employees must carefully review and verify the details before submitting the claim form.

NPCI planning to stop 'collect calls'. Here's whyA collect call, or 'pull' transaction, allows merchants to initiate payment requests from customers. Still, fraudsters tend to exploit this mechanism for the purpose of deceiving others into paying for non-existent goods and services.

Explained: How India can shield itself from Donald Trump's tariff stormCan India escape the fallout of Trump's trade war, or will rising tariffs leave its economy exposed? Here is all you need to know.

Planning to buy land in Mumbai? See what $1 million gets youIn 2014, Rs 8 crore could get you 102 sq m of property in Mumbai, but in 2024, it bought only 99 sq m, according to Knight Frank's 'The Wealth Report'.

LIC hopes to decide on stake in health insurance company by March: ReportIf it enters the health space through a stake purchase, LIC will compete with the likes of Star Health Insurance, Aditya Birla Health Insurance, Niva Bupa Health Insurance and Care Health Insurance.

How EPF balance ensures financial security? 5 benefits to knowA sufficient EPF balance is a safety net in tough times. Though you cannot withdraw all the funds at any given point, you can partially withdraw them for certain needs such as a medical emergency, repayment of a home loan, higher studies, or to meet marriage expenses.

Explained: Why Ola Electric shares gained 14% today after hitting record lowOla Electric share price: The rise comes as investors seem to be buying the dip after yesterday's sharp fall. Trading volumes are higher today, supporting the stock's rebound.

LG Electronics India receives Sebi nod for IPO. Check key detailsThe IPO consists solely of an offer for sale (OFS) of up to 10.18 crore equity shares by parent company LG Electronics Inc. The face value of each share is Rs 10.
NMDC shares rise 2% after interim dividend announcement. Check detailsNMDC share price: At 11:15 am, NMDC share price was up 2% to Rs 66.26 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).
Paytm shares surge 6% as subsidiary gets Sebi's research analyst certificateAt around 10:58 am, Paytm shares were up 5.39% to Rs 725.95 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

Sensex jumps 1,000 points to rise above 75,000. What investors need to knowStock market rally today: The S&P BSE Sensex jumped nearly 1,000 points in afternoon trade, crossing the 75,100 mark, while the Nifty 50 shot past 22,750. At 2:54 pm, the Sensex was up 990.66 points to 75,160.61, and the Nifty had gained 288.55 points, trading at 22,797.30.

Gold prices at record high: Will it keep rising in near future?Investors are flocking to gold as escalating trade tensions, U.S. tariff measures, and global uncertainties boost demand for the safe-haven asset. With prices soaring to record levels, the key question remains: Will gold continue its upward trajectory in the near future?

Sensex surges 1,000 points. Why is the stock market rising today?Stock market rally: By 2:44 pm, the Sensex was up 980.77 points at 75,150.72, while the Nifty gained 284.95 points to trade at 22,793.70. Banking, auto, and financial stocks led the rally, pushing benchmark indices higher.

entertainment.headline: SS Rajamouli enraged as he treks Odisha's Deomali trail, urges civic responsibilityFilmmaker SS Rajamouli went on a solo trek on the Deomali trail, the highest peak in Odisha. He highlighted the littered trail and urged the citizens to carry back their waste.

Victoria Beckham's stunning wedding dress for Nicole Brydon Bloom unveiledVictoria Beckham crafted a custom lace wedding dress for Nicole Brydon Bloom, featuring hand-sewn floral details. The gown debuted at Bloom and Justin Theroux's beach wedding, showcasing Beckham's timeless design aesthetic.

Punisher returns in 'Daredevil: Born Again' for explosive showdownFrank Castle, aka the Punisher, returns in Daredevil: Born Again, sparking a tense confrontation with Matt Murdock amid an ongoing murder investigation. Meanwhile, new suspects emerge in White Tiger's death.

Why Heather Thomas left Hollywood: The stalker nightmare that drove her awayHeather Thomas left Hollywood after enduring stalkers, break-ins, and death threats. She revealed the harrowing experiences that forced her into hiding and the challenges women face in the entertainment industry.

Kelly Clarkson returns to talk show after two-week absence – Here's whyKelly Clarkson returned to The Kelly Clarkson Show after a two-week absence due to a personal issue. Guest hosts covered for her, and she is now preparing for her Las Vegas residency.

Severance Season 2 Finale: Release date, runtime & what to expectThe Severance Season 2 finale airs March 20 on Apple TV+. With its sci-fi corporate thriller concept and gripping plot, the show remains a fan favorite. Season 3 is already in development.

Kevin Hart becomes World's highest-paid comedian in 2024, earning $81 millionKevin Hart became the world's highest-paid comedian in 2024, earning $81 million. His diversified portfolio—including films, streaming series, stand-up, and endorsements—helped him surpass stars like Jerry Seinfeld, Tom Cruise, and Hugh Jackman.

Taylor Swift teases Reputation era? Fans decode snake necklace at iHeart Awards 2025Taylor Swift made a surprise virtual appearance at the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2025, sparking speculation about Reputation (Taylor's Version) after wearing a snake choker, a nod to her iconic 2017 album.

Mariah Carey and Anderson .Paak Dating? iHeartRadio Music awards appearance sparks rumoursMariah Carey and Anderson .Paak reignite dating rumours after attending the 2025 iHeartRadio Music Awards together. Meanwhile, Mariah's speech references her past with Tommy Mottola, sparking further discussion about her early career struggles.
John Wick Ballerina trailer: Ana de Armas faces off Keanu ReevesThe second trailer of the highly anticipated John Wick spin-off, Ballerina, is here. And it promises loads of action and thrill.

Esha Deol on link-up rumours with Ajay Devgn: That was so weirdEsha Deol discussed past link-up rumours, including those with Ajay Devgn. She said it was weird and said their bond was more about respect and admiration for each other.

Actor Jonathan Majors wants to come back to Marvel, play Kang the Conqueror againActor Jonathan Majors is open to coming back to the world of Marvel movies again. Majors had been largely boycotted by the industry after his domestic abuse allegations.

Actor Parvathy on her role in Ullozhukku: I feel empowered because of AnjuDuring a recent interview, Malayalam actor Parvathy Thiruvothu shared her experience of filming for the role of Anju in the film Ullozhukku, for which she was nominated in the Best Supporting Actress category at the Critics' Choice Awards 2025.

Karma trailer: Shin Min-ah, Kim Hae-soo are at the centre of web of liesNetflix unveils Karma, a gripping Korean drama interweaving crime and fate. Starring a stellar cast, the series will explore deep connection between six different individuals and hidden truths.

Director-animator Shigeki Awai, man behind Naruto and One Piece, dies at 71Shigeki Awai, a legendary animator and director known for his extensive contributions to anime, died at the age of 71. Hideaki Matsuoka and Tsutomu Ohno paid tribute to him.

Elvish Yadav trolled for age-shaming Ankita Lokhande: Will you play Alia's mother?YouTuber Elvish Yadav recently faced online criticism after he openly age-shamed actor Ankita Lokhande. A video from a show where Yadav served the host has gone viral.

Mohanlal's Lucifer entry scene inspired by Rajinikanth: Prithviraj SukumaranMalayalam actor-director Prithviraj Sukumaran, who has been busy promoting his upcoming film L2: Empuraan, recently revealed that he took inspiration from Rajinikanth to design the entry scene of Mohanlal in the 2019 blockbuster film, Lucifer.

Composer Thaman on why Game Changer songs weren't popular: Lacked hook stepsDuring a recent interview, music composer Thaman opened up about his experience making music for Shankar's Game Changer, which starred Ram Charan and Kiara Advani. The film received negative reviews.
Director accused of stealing $11M from Netflix for a show that never aired Netflix had initially paid about $44 million to purchase an unfinished show called White Horse from Rinsch

general news.headline: Never been closer to peace, says US as Putin, Zelenskyy agree to 30-day truceWhite House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt on Thursday said that a 'lasting ceasefire' is under discussion and that the two sides have never been closer to peace.

Indian student in US accused of Hamas ties, detained, set to be deportedThe Donald Trump administration detained an Indian national and postdoctoral fellow, Badar Khan Suri, over allegations of spreading antisemitism and having ties to the Palestinian terrorist group Hamas.

Israel begins ground assault in Gaza day after airstrikes, captures key corridorGround operations in central and southern Gaza came a day after Israel launched aerial bombardment of the strip, reportedly killing over 400 people and shattering a two-month-old ceasefire deal with Hamas.

US responds amid row over spy chief's minority persecution in Bangladesh remarksAmid a row over US spy chief Tulsi Gabbard's remarks on minority persecution in Bangladesh, the White House said that while America condemns any instances of violence towards minorities in any country, it also welcomed measures by the Muhammad Yunus-led government to ensure the safety of all.

Rise or resurgence? Textile art in India goes mainstreamKnown fashion labels like Tarun Tahiliani, Pero and Anavila at art and home decor exhibitions? It certainly says something about the rise...errr... resurgence of textile art.

Farmers clash with Punjab cops, Jagjit Dallewal detained, protest sites razedSeveral farmers clashed with Punjab Police in Mohali while heading towards the protest sites of Khanauri and Shambhu borders. The Punjab Police, meanwhile, began dismantling tents by using bulldozers at the sites.

Hang her: Parents of Meerut woman who killed husband, hid body in cement drumThe father of the Meerut woman, who along with her lover, are accused of killing her husband and hiding his chopped body in a cement-filled drum, said she could not live without drugs and wanted to get rid of him.

Hamas must give up power or Israel will take over Gaza: Israeli envoy Reuven AzarIsrael's Ambassador to India Reuven Azar said Israel had been waiting for a "long time" for Hamas to release the remaining hostages. He justified the military pressure on the Palestinian group to achieve a diplomatic solution to end the war.

The IPL story, Part 1: Power, politics, and cricket in its origin sagaThe Indian Premier League's origin story is one of power, politics, and ambition, driven by Lalit Modi's vision. From political maneuvering to the league's explosive rise, it set the stage for a saga of success and scandal.

Cocaine worth Rs 38.4 crore seized at Bengaluru airport, Ghana woman arrestedDRI officials seized 3.186 kg cocaine worth Rs 38.4 crore at the Kempegowda International Airport in Bengaluru from a Ghanaian woman.

US faces housing crisis. Why Elon Musk's DOGE is to blameThe US is staring at a housing crisis after Elon Musk's DOGE halted federal housing projects, cutting $30 million in grants, worsening affordability, and stalling 1,000+ programs.

Trump set to sign executive order to shut down Department of Education: ReportDonald Trump plans to shut down the Department of Education through an executive order, but legal challenges from Democratic attorneys general may block the move.

Deepika Padukone is 'figuring out' how to return to work without mother's guiltActor Deepika Padukone recently spoke about her daughter Dua and how she is still figuring out between motherhood and work. The actor added how motherhood has influenced the kind of roles and movies she will pick now.

SS Rajamouli enraged as he treks Odisha's Deomali trail, urges civic responsibilityFilmmaker SS Rajamouli went on a solo trek on the Deomali trail, the highest peak in Odisha. He highlighted the littered trail and urged the citizens to carry back their waste.

Outrage over Tamil Nadu schoolgirls cleaning toilets, headmaster suspendedA viral video of schoolgirls cleaning toilets at a Tamil Nadu government school sparked outrage. Authorities suspended the headmaster and BJP criticised the state's education model under Chief Minister MK Stalin.

OnlyFans model charged with murder after BDSM fetish turns deadlyRylaarsdam filmed a sexually explicit video for her OnlyFans profile with Dale at his home in Escondido, California. During the video, Rylaarsdam bound Dale in plastic wrap and duct tape, which led to his asphyxiation and death.

Danish tourists clean up Sikkim roadside in video. Internet calls it a wake-up callA video of two Danish tourists cleaning the litter around the roadside of a village in North Sikkim went viral on social media.

US Supreme Court likely to review 26/11 accused Tahawwur Rana's extradition pleaThe US Supreme Court is expected to review Tahawwur Rana's plea seeking a stay on his extradition to India. Judges will consider the application during a private conference on April 4, 2025. Rana's earlier review petition was rejected on March 6 by Justice Kagan, after which he filed a fresh plea for consideration by the Chief Justice.
Official at Elon Musk's DOGE to assume key role at beleaguered USAID: ReportLewin is a DOGE official who has worked with Musk's government-cutting efforts at USAID

IndiaToday.in's Sibu Tripathi, 3 other India Today journalists win Ramnath Goenka awardFour journalists from India Today received the Ramnath Goenka Award for journalism. Awardees include Sibu Tripathi for Joshimath reporting, Mridulika Jha for migration stories, Ashutosh Mishra for Manipur violence coverage, and Siddhant Mohan for 'The Kerala Story'.
Demand rises for Punch, Exter micro SUVs! Find out the reasonsThe micro SUVs are witnessing high sales in India. We discuss the reasons for the handsome performance.

Indian Green Card holders face deportation risk: Their rights and recourseGreen Card holders, including Indians, are facing never-before-seen scrutiny as the Trump administration walks the talk on citizenship, immigration and deportation. What are the rights of American Green Card holders, and what legal recourse do they have if they are threatened with deportation?

Ageless Sunil Chhetri shines as India maul Maldives 3-0 in friendlySunil Chhetri marked his international return with India's 3-0 win over Maldives, contributing to a dominant performance and showing signs of his old brilliance.

Pics: Salman Khan and family come together for AR Murugadoss's Sikandar screeningSalman Khan and AR Murugadoss hosted a special screening of their upcoming film, Sikandar, in Mumbai. Khan's family attended the screening.

sports.headline: Dhoni still has the fastest hands in the world as a wicketkeeper: UthappaIPL 2025: Robin Uthappa said that MS Dhoni is amongst the best wicketkeepers in the world even at the age of 43 and one could expect glimpses of brilliance from the former CSK captain.

With games set to come at us thick and fast, we at the Sledging Room thought that this was the best time to shift to a new and updated studio to bring you the best moments of the tournament.

Clemson Nearing contract extension for head coach Brad BrownellClemson is reportedly finalizing a deal to extend Brad Brownell's tenure, keeping the longtime head coach at the helm as the Tigers aim to build on recent success in the ACC.

JuJu Watkins, Hannah Hidalgo lead AP Women's All-America teamUSC's JuJu Watkins and Notre Dame's Hannah Hidalgo headline the AP All-America squad, joined by Paige Bueckers, Lauren Betts, and Madison Booker in a star-studded lineup of elite talent.

Can AI crack March Madness code? one disruptor bets $1 Million on 'Yes'A Houston-based innovator is wagering big on AI's predictive power, investing $1 million in an algorithm-driven bracket to outsmart the competition in this year's NCAA tournament.

Jalen Milroe impresses at Pro Day, blazes 40 with Steelers watching closelyAlabama quarterback Jalen Milroe turned heads with his blazing 40-yard dash at pro day, showcasing elite speed as Pittsburgh Steelers scouts watched closely ahead of the NFL Draft.

NHL set for CBA Talks, weighs next All-Star game plansAs the NHL prepares for labor discussions, league officials and players' representatives will also consider potential changes to the next All-Star Game, aiming to enhance the fan experience and competition.

NBA: Cavaliers eye 12th straight road win against KingsCleveland heads to Sacramento riding an 11-game road winning streak, aiming to extend their dominance away from home. The Kings, however, look to defend their turf in a crucial matchup.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
